entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Really,Really. Who gives a crap about trump and his racist red faced politician. Right now its about helping the American People, stopping covid-19 before thousands of more Americans die. Stop blaming China, no one controls what you read, trump is as much to blame as anyone else.
